events.name: Baylor Bears at Kansas State Wildcats

headlines.description: Jarrett Stidham threw for 419 yards and three scores in his first start, Corey Coleman caught a pair of touchdown passes and No. 2 Baylor held on for a 31-24 victory over pesky Kansas State.

video.headline: INT secures Baylor's win over Kansas State

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (SC Baylor-Kansas State) 2015/11/05 ESHEET SportsCenter

headlines.shortLinkText: Baylor holds off pesky K-State 31-24 to stay perfect

events.name: Mississippi State Bulldogs at Missouri Tigers

headlines.description: Dak Prescott threw four touchdown passes and No. 24 Mississippi State got 100-yard receiving games from De'Runnya Wilson and Fred Ross in a rain-soaked 31-13 victory over Missouri on Thursday nig

video.headline: Prescott tosses four scores in win

headlines.shortLinkText: Prescott throws 4 TD passes, Mississippi State tops Missouri

events.name: Buffalo Bulls at Kent State Golden Flashes
Ball State Cardinals at Western Michigan Broncos

headlines.description: Zach Terrell threw three touchdown passes to Corey Davis and Western Michigan had a school-record 711 yards of total offence in a 54-7 victory over Ball State on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Terrell, Western Michigan blow out Ball State 54-7

events.name: Arkansas State Red Wolves at Appalachian State Mountaineers

headlines.description: Fredi Knighten threw for 208 yards and one touchdown, JD Houston kicked four field goals, and Arkansas State scored 26 straight points in a 40-27 victory over Appalachian State on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arkansas State scores 26 straight; beats Appalachian State

events.name: Nevada Wolf Pack at Fresno State Bulldogs

headlines.description: James Butler ran for 122 yards and one touchdown, freshman Dameon Baber tied a conference single-game record with three interceptions in the second half and Nevada beat Fresno State 30-16 on Thur
headlines.shortLinkText: Nevada shuts down Fresno State in 2nd half for 30-16 win
